title: ip.src.metro\_code
content:
`ip.src.metro_code` String

The metro code or Designated Market Area (DMA) code associated with the incoming request.

**Note**: Currently the value of `ip.src.metro_code` is always `"0"`, but this may change in the future. Refer to the [Changelog](https://developers.cloudflare.com/changelog/) for any updates.
